description.value: You easily maneuver against your foes. Your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Grapple]{Grapple}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Shove]{Shove}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Trip]{Trip} actions have a lower multiple attack penalty: -4 instead of -5 if they're the second attack on your turn, or -8 instead of -10 if they're the third or subsequent attack on your turn.
